casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2003-1904. State v. Ferguson.

Montgomery C.P. No. 2002-CR-00353. Reported at 108 Ohio St.3d 451, 2006-Ohio-1502, 844 N.E.2d 806. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the date previously set by this court for the execution of sentence in this case is hereby modified. Said sentence shall be carried into execution on Tuesday, August 8, 2006.
